overview:
Successful and passionate veteran Internet professional.

Summary: • 3 companies last 16 years, 2 self-funded and successful Internet/tech start-ups • CEO for 14 years, COO for 2 during that period • CEO over $1B in always-profitable revenue • Strategy, Marketing, Key Partnership and Operations focus • Primarily consumer-facing search, ecomm and social networking; SaaS and Web-interface; extensive B2B as well • Prior to Internet ventures, over 10 years in private, commercial and investment banking

Co-Founder and (former) COO FindTheBest.com, Inc. 2009 – Current Santa Barbara, CA. FindTheBest is an unbiased, data-driven comparison engine.

CEO WP Associates, Inc. 2003 – 2009 Palm Beach Gardens, Florida. A consumer Web content management and services company.

CEO and Founder Qfactor, Inc. January 1996 – April 2004 DC/NY/SF. One of the first and largest Internet advertising agencies. Pioneered online performance marketing.

Johnson received his degree in Finance from the University of South Florida in 1981.

He and his family currently live in Los Altos Hills.
